howItWorks.label: How It Works
howItWorks.title: Simple. Brilliant. Effective.
howItWorks.description: The Review Filter acts as a digital buffer that strategically filters negative reviews.
howItWorks.step1Desc: Customers scan the QR code or tap the NFC chip on your display.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Happy customers are directed to Google. Unhappy ones send feedback directly to you.
howItWorks.step3Desc: You only receive positive reviews on Google — plus valuable feedback to improve.

benefits.title: Why Review Filter?
benefits.benefit1Desc: Our filter ensures only the best reviews appear on Google — automatically and reliably.
benefits.benefit2Desc: Scan a QR or tap NFC. No app, no login, zero friction for your customers.
benefits.benefit3Desc: Better reviews = more clicks = more customers. More effective and cheaper than any SEO campaign.
